tags: sorry if this is a downer
I don't really want to get into a debate bout this
summary: have we had any alignment shifts in CR? I think it would be interesting to see. my group just had one and it was glorious. the...
question: have we had any alignment shifts in CR? I think it would be interesting to see. my group just had one and it was glorious. the character had been slowly going from NG to CN and it culminated in her killing the NPC who challenged another party member to a duel. (you may be bound by honor, but I’m not!)
answer:
Yes, there was at least two in Campaign 1, with Vex. It was a touch controversial, to be honest, and I don’t want to start discourse or spoil stuff for you, so I won’t go into it here. 

I think a character’s morals and values changing, like you said, can be super interesting, and that sounds like a great moment. That being said, on a personal level, I don’t like alignments and I don’t think they’re a great way of categorizing morality and value systems. Matt doesn’t use alignments too much anyways, and when he does, it’s much more descriptive than prescriptive, but personally, I don’t like playing with alignment rules.

But! Again! I do like to see explorations of morality, just not using that system! And I’m glad you get that in your game :)

But! Again! I do like to see explorations of morality, just not using that system! And I’m glad you get that in your game :)

Yes, there was at least two in Campaign 1, with Vex. It was a touch controversial, to be honest, and I don’t want to start discourse or spoil stuff for you, so I won’t go into it here. 

I think a character’s morals and values changing, like you said, can be super interesting, and that sounds like a great moment. That being said, on a personal level, I don’t like alignments and I don’t think they’re a great way of categorizing morality and value systems. Matt doesn’t use alignments too much anyways, and when he does, it’s much more descriptive than prescriptive, but personally, I don’t like playing with alignment rules.

But! Again! I do like to see explorations of morality, just not using that system! And I’m glad you get that in your game :)

summary: The flaw also does fit for a character from a small village town. Lot of judgement and shit being taught to kids, small town...
question: The flaw also does fit for a character from a small village town. Lot of judgement and shit being taught to kids, small town girl Veth learned to be this way from her environment, even if the people around her where also assholes to her, and that will be hard to break. Hopefully she manages to break away from the small town village mentality she grew up with, with enough time.
answer:
100% yes, but I also think that’s what makes this flaw particularly interesting. Nott has been treated horribly most of her life just because she was Veth, but still was resilient enough to find happiness. And when she had this devastating thing happen to her, lost her family and was changed in to a goblin, she got treated horribly once more, but this time just because she was a Goblin. But she’s fighting her way through that, too. 

You would think, having experienced so much judgement herself, she would have learned not to do the same to others. And yet, she herself is quick to judge, and has big issues changing her opinions. She always thinks she knows what’s best for people, and has trouble listening when people tell her to stop. 

Unfortunately, I think her past experiences have only managed to reinforce her own small town behaviour. Because it’s a form of self-defence; a way of protecting herself that allowed her to fight through those past experiences in the first place. 

Her quick judgements are a way to sort good people from bad people. Her stubborn opinions prevent her from getting stabbed in the back by accidentally trusting those who do not deserve it. Not listening to others and mulishly deciding what’s best for her friends is her way of protecting them. Because she thinks they don’t understand what she knows about people and about the world, and the things that need to be done in order to protect what you love. But she’s wrong, of course.

She’s afraid to let go, she’s afraid of opening herself and her friends up to the world. Having an open mind is being vulnerable, and Nott has just had too many experiences of getting burned that way. 

But she needs to change regardless, because she doesn’t understand her way of protecting those she loves is also hurting them, and herself.

summary: campaign 2 episode 53: I’m not late you’re early (my roommate dragged me out of my show to talk about rps and fics for two hours...
body:
campaign 2 episode 53: I’m not late you’re early

(my roommate dragged me out of my show to talk about rps and fics for two hours so I caught the rebroadcast instead) (thank you for doing the rebroadcast critical role twitch channel)

  • me, poking at the D&D Beyond overlay: caduceus has vampiric touch?? my roommate, drunk from being at work for 14 hours: YOU GOT THE TOUCH
  • WOOF WOOF
  • have I mentioned that I super love how taliesin is wearing his hair lately
  • bc I super do
  • “maybe you can drink out of its ass at the next live show” out-of-context gold
  • “and alive”
  • I love talisen’s laugh, I can’t think of a word to describe it other than “squelch” but it’s somehow still wonderful
  • matt trolling travis is what I’m here for
  • “travis.” “…..oh, -shit-”
  • “wet dreams~”
  • they’re gonna end up having to murder an eldritch god for fjord
  • “everyone’s gonna take care of you. it’s gonna be alright.” I love this firbolg
  • travis is gonna die
  • cad in the corner with the mom look
  • all my stress dreams involve teeth
  • “caleb widogast is my name” “that’s actually not your name”
  • as liam valiantly fights a spittake
  • caleb pleads the fifth
  • “I’ll fjord you later for that” “you will NOT”
  • hit that rewind button
  • taliesin died
  • “holla” is going to be a thing now isn’t it
  • you don’t have to use the whole message JESTER
  • AUGH just leave him on “are you still coming” you MONSTERS
  • “straight fjord” oxymoron
  • I miss vex’s old lady disguise with the crazy eye
  • guano hoarder
  • “I wanna feel the thunder between my legs” travis
  • can’t wait for everyone to lose one or more limbs
  • big kitty
  • “I’m doctor doolittle motherfucker”
  • twitch chat: cadoolittle
  • the magic of meow mix
  • now I’m waiting for them to get a keep (or similar) and these three giant cats stalk around outside it
  • “just like red dead” hopefully the cats handle better than the horses in red dead
  • HA managed to come back on the rebroadcast almost exactly where I left off last night
  • (my roommate dragged me away to talk about RP and fic for two hours) (it was a good time it just also made me miss the rest of critrole)
  • I don’t have the overlay on the replay but I distinctly remember seeing Jester’s deathsave counter pop up
  • (I also remember “I bet she’s five kobolds in a trenchcoat” and “fight club FIGHT CLUB” from discord and twitch chat) (I’m very concerned)
  • “critters” oh no
  • isn’t yonic like phallic but for vaginas
  • I want to meet Cad’s sister so bad
  • “timauk and eud make things” “sounds like an etsy shop” it absolutely does
  • “are you hitting on the ivy” oh no my merle highchurch ptsd
  • “I eat plants” “PFFFFFFT”
  • “I have a BIG HEAD…and tiny arms”
  • “I don’t like iiiiiiit” “I love her sO MUCH” there are two kinds of people (and they’re married to each other)
  • “not souls or faces?” “are you offering?”
  • “sadly he has neither” travis: 
  • “legends of vox machina: 100% free of tiny hands” “YOU CAN’T GUARANTEE THAT LIAM”
  • two mimosas
  • travis is gonna die
  • “how do you sustain yourself?” “I have my ways” fjord: 
  • “kill this biiiitch”
  • FIVE KOBOLDS IN A TRENCHCOAT
  • the last time they went in a house and the floor was covered in blood it ended with percy getting shot to death JUST SAYING
  • does laura have a razorblade on the end of her pencil
  • “you know when I’m gonna murder everyone? in about five minutes if we don’t fucKING EAT”
  • so THAT’S why his hp inexplicably dropped on the overlay
  • beau is going to try to make friends with an ogre and I’m going to secondhand embarrassment myself to death
  • laura’s face is my face
  • caleb hiding from beau’s imminent bar fight
  • even during the rebroadcast I have to deal with the child in the middle
  • POTION DICE man I want one of those. matt open an etsy shop.
  • drunk fjord sounds upsettingly like arthur morgan
  • “you’re gonna get your asses kicked, you didn’t eat” I love cadmom
  • travis calm thyself
  • marisha has forgotten how chairs work
  • (I showed my roommate this last night as a demonstration of my Stress Level System)
  • did matt build a monk entirely to get marisha back for all the stunning strikes
  • “GROVEL AT MY FEET, SCUM” I love jester so much
  • travis: ohhh, hot
  • jester down, jester down
  • I just realized this is basically beau from the opening
  • RKO OUTTA NOWHERE
  • “such an invaluable lesson to be learned here” I love cadmom
  • did nott just pull let’s you and him fight
  • my brain refuses to hear “more than meats the eye” without doing the transformers jingle
  • “rolled perception so low he left the campaign”
  • “I mean you can watch, does that make you uncomfortable” look I don’t overly ship beaujester but also
  • you ever have that teacher who disguises herself so she can kick the shit out of you in a fight pit

  • you don’t have to use the whole message JESTER
  • AUGH just leave him on “are you still coming” you MONSTERS
  • “straight fjord” oxymoron
  • I miss vex’s old lady disguise with the crazy eye
  • guano hoarder
  • “I wanna feel the thunder between my legs” travis
  • can’t wait for everyone to lose one or more limbs
  • big kitty
  • “I’m doctor doolittle motherfucker”

  • the magic of meow mix
  • now I’m waiting for them to get a keep (or similar) and these three giant cats stalk around outside it
  • “just like red dead” hopefully the cats handle better than the horses in red dead
  • HA managed to come back on the rebroadcast almost exactly where I left off last night
  • (my roommate dragged me away to talk about RP and fic for two hours) (it was a good time it just also made me miss the rest of critrole)
  • I don’t have the overlay on the replay but I distinctly remember seeing Jester’s deathsave counter pop up
  • (I also remember “I bet she’s five kobolds in a trenchcoat” and “fight club FIGHT CLUB” from discord and twitch chat) (I’m very concerned)
  • “critters” oh no
  • isn’t yonic like phallic but for vaginas
  • I want to meet Cad’s sister so bad
  • “timauk and eud make things” “sounds like an etsy shop” it absolutely does
  • “are you hitting on the ivy” oh no my merle highchurch ptsd
  • “I eat plants” “PFFFFFFT”
  • “I have a BIG HEAD…and tiny arms”
  • “I don’t like iiiiiiit” “I love her sO MUCH” there are two kinds of people (and they’re married to each other)
  • “not souls or faces?” “are you offering?”
  • “sadly he has neither” travis: 
  • “legends of vox machina: 100% free of tiny hands” “YOU CAN’T GUARANTEE THAT LIAM”
  • two mimosas
  • travis is gonna die
  • “how do you sustain yourself?” “I have my ways” fjord: 
  • “kill this biiiitch”
  • FIVE KOBOLDS IN A TRENCHCOAT
  • the last time they went in a house and the floor was covered in blood it ended with percy getting shot to death JUST SAYING
  • does laura have a razorblade on the end of her pencil
  • “you know when I’m gonna murder everyone? in about five minutes if we don’t fucKING EAT”
  • so THAT’S why his hp inexplicably dropped on the overlay
  • beau is going to try to make friends with an ogre and I’m going to secondhand embarrassment myself to death
  • laura’s face is my face
  • caleb hiding from beau’s imminent bar fight
  • even during the rebroadcast I have to deal with the child in the middle
  • POTION DICE man I want one of those. matt open an etsy shop.
  • drunk fjord sounds upsettingly like arthur morgan
  • “you’re gonna get your asses kicked, you didn’t eat” I love cadmom
  • travis calm thyself
  • marisha has forgotten how chairs work
  • (I showed my roommate this last night as a demonstration of my Stress Level System)
  • did matt build a monk entirely to get marisha back for all the stunning strikes
  • “GROVEL AT MY FEET, SCUM” I love jester so much
  • travis: ohhh, hot
  • jester down, jester down
  • I just realized this is basically beau from the opening
  • RKO OUTTA NOWHERE
  • “such an invaluable lesson to be learned here” I love cadmom
  • did nott just pull let’s you and him fight
  • my brain refuses to hear “more than meats the eye” without doing the transformers jingle
  • “rolled perception so low he left the campaign”
  • “I mean you can watch, does that make you uncomfortable” look I don’t overly ship beaujester but also
  • you ever have that teacher who disguises herself so she can kick the shit out of you in a fight pit

blog.name: bloodyshadow1
blog.title: Ethereal Hope
blog.description: I should warn you, I have no idea what I'm doing

summary: Just saying from what I counted Dairon took close to 106 damage that fight, i might have missed an attack.  That's 40 more hp...
body: Just saying from what I counted Dairon took close to 106 damage that fight, i might have missed an attack. That’s 40 more hp then Beau and still almost lost. So despite the dive screwing her over and marisha forgetting to use a d8 sometimes, Beau did pretty damn good for someone at least 3 levels weaker

So despite the dive screwing her over and marisha forgetting to use a d8 sometimes, Beau did pretty damn good for someone at least 3 levels weaker

So despite the dive screwing her over and marisha forgetting to use a d8 sometimes, Beau did pretty damn good for someone at least 3 levels weaker
